individual_metadata.synopsis: Cat is hanging around Barcus' workshop. Cat is not very friendly and player won't really be able to change the cat into being friendly, only temporarily not-aggro. If the player intimidates the cat, they can convince the cat to leave into the shadowcurse. Might do followup in future but none planned now. If placated, cat will tell player not to trust Isobel.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the debug book to click 'Act 2 setup' and 'Tiefling path', Go to -62; 27; 133Head towards the cat

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only one session was provided (with an empty string as its name) and there is no reference to any other session. Thus, there are no ordering constraints (predecessor-successor relations) or exclusivity constraints between multiple sessions.

29.speaker: His Majesty
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Can in a some aggressive idle (arched back)

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: *Your years of hunting and tracking have taught you to recognise a territorial animal when you see it.*

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Easy, kitty. I mean you no harm.

74.speaker: His Majesty
74.text: AND YET YOU HARM ME BY YOUR VERY PRESENCE!

52.speaker: Player
52.text: What's got your whiskers in a twist?

59.speaker: His Majesty
59.text: This is my territory. And you're in it.

46.speaker: His Majesty
46.text: Indeed, you will. Or you'll find my claws planted firmly in your dangles.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: My intentions are pure. I only wanted to admire you up close.

34.speaker: His Majesty
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cat in a neutral idle

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Quite the specimen you are. How did you come to this place?

71.speaker: His Majesty
71.text: You've had enough! Now go! Quickly! HISS!

80.speaker: Player
80.text: You seem like someone who knows what he's about. Heard anything interesting around here?

20.speaker: His Majesty
20.text: Good of you to notice. For my part, I have noticed the cleric is a liar.

45.speaker: His Majesty
45.text: She promised me a bit of milk. But do you see any milk? Do you? Nor do I. Disgraceful.

2.speaker: His Majesty
2.text: You'll see these points unless you retreat!
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Indicates paws by gesturing with head or raising claws, whatever we can manage.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Barcus is permitted and I'm not?

38.speaker: His Majesty
38.text: I see. Yes, perhaps you're right.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Good. I'd like it if we could have a civil discussion.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: How did you get to this place?

3.speaker: His Majesty
3.text: It was quite straightforward. I slinked.

40.speaker: His Majesty
40.text: Plenty of pointless banging about. The only highlight was when the cleric here promised me a bit of milk that has yet to materialise.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: I could use someone like you in my camp. Care to join?

54.speaker: Player
54.text: You're in my territory. Get out.

84.speaker: His Majesty
84.text: You know, I think it's time I move somewhere better-suited to my lifestyle.

79.speaker: His Majesty
79.text: A parting piece of advice: don't trust the cleric. She's a bounder and a cad. Much like yourself, some might say.

83.speaker: His Majesty
83.context: NodeContext: Angry cat noise leading to end of dialogue

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I do not seek your territory, noble beast, only a few moments of your time.

66.speaker: His Majesty
66.text: You'll be under attack if you don't heed my hiss!

9.speaker: Player
9.text: You should get out of here - this place is vulnerable to the shadow curse.

0.speaker: His Majesty
0.text: Aw, is the little kitten afraid of some shadows? PATHETIC!

35.speaker: His Majesty
35.text: I don't know who you are. I don't know why you're here. But I will kill you.

69.speaker: His Majesty
69.text: Would that I lived on an island, far away, all alone...

82.speaker: His Majesty
82.text: There you are, unfortunately. Ever since you arrived, things keep... changing. I hate it.

86.speaker: His Majesty
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: annoyed and a little unsure

89.speaker: His Majesty
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cat hisses at the player

16.context: CinematicNodeContext: DU player hisses or growls at the cat horribly.

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: Well, at least you purr for me...

76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player crouches down on haunches and holds out hand in a 'here kitty kitty' way

10.speaker: His Majesty
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cat doesn't approach, but meows in a non-threatening (though still wary) way

78.speaker: His Majesty
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cat meows in an unfriendly way and backs away, disengaging with player.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Reach out to pet the cat.

8.speaker: His Majesty
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cat rears back in a defensive stance and hisses at the player, maybe even swipes paws if it's possibe.

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: Chk. Why would anyone keep such neurotic creatures as pets?

25.speaker: His Majesty
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cat lunges out and swipes at the player's foot. Player steps back, but isn't hurt.
